actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend title III of the National Housing Act to authorize the Government's National Mortgage Association to guarantee obligations issued by State agencies to finance low and moderate-income housing.

summary.text: Authorizes, under title III of the National Housing Act, the National Government Mortgage Association to guarantee obligations issued by State agencies to finance low- and moderate-income housing. (Adds 12 U.S.C. 1721(h))

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the National Housing Act to authorize the Government's National Mortgage Association to guarantee obligations issued by State agencies to finance low and moderate-income housing.
